text:
Where doc says:

"and ProxyPassReverseCookiePath directives, and causes them to substitute the value of an environment variable varname for the string ${varname}  in configuration directives."

I would add something like:

in configuration directives (if interpolate option is configured)

I know I should read more carefull ProxyPassReverse sipnopsis, but a hint like this would make me waste less time :-)

Thanks!
creator: javibarroso@gmail.com

text: Thank you. Clarification applied to trunk in r1200970.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
